title: An Act to ensure information management integrity by the office of the child advocate

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Tarr, a petition (accompanied by bill) (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Bruce E. Tarr for legislation to ensure information management integrity by the office of the child advocate.  Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities
